title: Review: 661 Recon Advance D3O Knee Pads pack optional hard shell protection
content:
British mountain bike protection manufacturers, SixSixOne, have recently updated their elbow and knee pad offering, releasing the ultra flexible, ultra lightweight Recon D3O and, more recently, the Recon Advance D3O. While we liked the wearability and breathability of the former, particularly for longer cross-country rides, we reasoned that its flexible D3O Ghost pad left the

The post Review: 661 Recon Advance D3O Knee Pads pack optional hard shell protection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
